data.name: xrLabel38.Text
data.value: This is to certify that I, <CustomerName> understood the customer loan guide, explain/orient by your representative <RepresentativeName>. I am all aware under the provision of chattel mortgage and promissory note.

data.name: xrLabel33.Text
data.value: 11. CARNAPPED, LOSS, DAMAGE, AND CANNIBALZED, or whatsoever reasons undre mortgage, your obligation must continue in paying monthly installment until full payment as agreed in chattel mortgage and promissory note.

data.name: xrLabel32.Text
data.value: 10. The motorcycle mortgage unit, own by 28ARC CREDIT AND ALLIED SERVICES INC only. Under encumbrance to your name, But Sale or pledge of this unit mortgaged property to a third party is strictly prohibited under the provision of the chattel mortgage. The company has the absolute right to prosecute and file criminal charges under the revised penal code.

data.name: xrLabel31.Text
data.value: 9. The company extent credit and approved your application base in your declared general situation, but if you have change your residence or place of work, you must report to our company 28ARC CREDIT AND ALLIED SERVICES INC, to certified approval, but if disapproved, you must surrender or deposit the unit for computation of full payment.

data.name: xrLabel30.Text
data.value: 8. Redemption will last until one (1) month only from the time of your unit was deposited in our office. "NO BALANCE" and Pay all monthly dues for retrieval or redemption to continue the payment term.

data.name: xrLabel27.Text
data.value: 5.Failure to pay on due date, expect our office will remind you by personal visit of our personnel, collection/reminder letter, call/text, and other means of communication for follow up of your due account.

data.name: xrLabel26.Text
data.value: 4. The company will exercise due date of payment to avail the rebate. If delayed, monthly amortization can pay within the 5 days from due date and additional 5% interest will effect after 5 days grace period until next due date.

data.name: xrLabel10.Text
data.value: 4. The Company will only pay the first year of registration. In the time of renewal or expiration of your motorcycle registration, it is your obligation to process with expenses herewith and insurance premium.

data.name: xrLabel9.Text
data.value: 3. The 28 ARC CREDIT AND ALLIED SERVICES INC can only provide sales transaction papers to certify that you own the motorcycle in installment term. In the event of accident, impoundment, disobedience to traffic rules, no license and/or any act of violation by negligence in your part will leave the company with no liability and will not pay any expense that may occur - these will solely be shouldered by you.

data.name: xrLabel7.Text
data.value: 1. Upon completion of our sales transaction, we will endorse the following pertinent papers to Land Transportation Office (LTO) for motorcycle registration by encumbered, LTO office will inform us is to when the MC Registration will be available for pick-up, more or less maximum three (3) months from date of receipt by LTO.

data.name: xrLabel6.Text
data.value: You have entered into purchase contract LOAN with 28 ARC CREDIT AND ALLIED INC, it is expected that you will follow and comply all the terms and conditions as you signed the chattel Mortgage and Promissory note.
